metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10104 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: In several JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate versions, an Application Serverrun configuration (for Tomcat, Jetty, Resin, or CloudBees) with the defaultsetting allowed a remote attacker to execute code when the configuration isrunning, because a JMX server listened on all interfaces instead oflocalhost only. The issue has been fixed in the following versions:2018.3.4, 2018.2.8, 2018.1.8, and 2017.3.7.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
